extendedInfo.description: Everything to find and finance your new homeCompare homes, take photos & video, calculate payments and contact a Chase Mortgage Banker.Whether youâve bought a home before or are a first time home buyer, Chase My New Home will help you find and finance your ideal new home. SEARCH NATIONAL MLS LISTINGS AND COMPARE HOMES FOR SALEâ¢ Input features most important to you in buying a house, like price range, property type and other home detailsâ¢ Rate homes based on how well they match your preferences â¢ save homes to your favorites and organize them for easy accessSAVE COMMENTS, PHOTOS AND VIDEOS â¢ Add photos, videos and audio notes to your favorite listingsâ¢ Save comments in the home journalâ¢ View your journal to remember homes youâve visitedUSE OUR HELPFUL CALCULATORSâ¢ Estimate how much you can affordâ¢ Estimate your monthly paymentsâ¢ Learn how much you could save with Chase Mortgage Cash BackCONTACT A CHASE MORTGAGE BANKER FOR HELP ALONG THE WAYâ¢ Learn about different loan programs and which might be right for youâ¢ Prequalify so you can shop with confidenceChase is an Equal Housing LenderWe would love to hear you feedback, email us at chase.my.new.home@chase.com.DisclosureTools and calculators are provided as a courtesy to help users estimate mortgage needs. Results shown are estimates only. Speak with a Chase mortgage consultant for more specific information.

reviews.title: Agree with bad reviews
reviews.comment: If chase allows this bad app to stay out there, I assume they take the same pride in there financial services.
reviews.author: Art Smith

reviews.title: HTC Rezound
reviews.comment: Stopped working. Can\'t use it at all.
reviews.author: Aleksandr Belaks

reviews.title: Listings are not accurate
reviews.comment: Listings of houses are not accurate. Some are not even on the market.
reviews.author: Michael Wooddell

reviews.title: Not working after some time of use
reviews.comment: Stopped working for me. Can\'t research anything any more.
reviews.author: MILAD AZADI

reviews.title: Yup
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: Ryan Case

reviews.title: Best app of it\'s kind
reviews.comment: With all the features included in this app, you will be able to find a home, assemble a team, and get financing all in one place!
reviews.author: Brian Million

reviews.title: Listings are not acurate
reviews.comment: Listings need to be uodated more often.
reviews.author: Dwayne Nelson

reviews.title: Outdated real estate info
reviews.comment: Like the general MLS, many homes that are shown as available have already been sold.  Pointless.
reviews.author: Rob Hedges

reviews.title: Better apps out there.
reviews.comment: Does what it does, but the pictures in the market are photoshopped, that home has the wrong address, in the wrong neighborhood, at a unbelievable low price.
reviews.author: Jason Morris

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This will help me find a good home.
reviews.author: Sharon Makar

reviews.title: Needs work.
reviews.comment: Almost there. Need to add some filters.  Such as most importantly active listings only (why waste my time looking at properties already under contract! ), waterfront, swimming pool, basement, 3 car garage etc etc etc... it only filters based on miles, price, bathrooms, bedrooms, very basic.
reviews.author: Kristy Fujii

reviews.comment: Best home buying tool on Google Play
reviews.author: Mike Hirsch

reviews.comment: Good app
reviews.author: jose l serrano

reviews.title: Not what
reviews.comment: Not what i expected
reviews.author: Pieface G

reviews.title: Nice app!
reviews.comment: Gave it 4 stars because it is very helpful giving additional information on total monthly payments including fees and taxes but when I filter the radius, it shows all listings, not just 10 or 15 miles from the zip code I enter in.
reviews.author: Rowena Olea

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Keeps saying that I can\'t connect to the internet. Good job Chase
reviews.author: Justin Sorrentino

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: None of the listings have your criteria listed. No bedrooms or bathroom info available. Just contact info for brokers. USELESS!!!
reviews.author: Joseph Biglay

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: This app never saves the search criteria I enter for my new home. Also, the pricing is very inaccurate; there were several 3 bed/2 bath houses on sale for $1,000 (yes, one thousand dollars).
reviews.author: Roji Eappen

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: It was working fine first day. Now it won\'t let me refine keeps saying no internet connection. Already uninstalled it and installed it and still won\'t work
reviews.author: Francisco Lopez

reviews.title: Bad and remove it
reviews.comment: This app should not even be up. Not working at all. Chase you fail
reviews.author: jose encarnacion
